title: Inverse Functions - involving a square root

content.question: ​The function <math alttext="f"><semantics><mi>f</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is defined by <math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses equals 4 x squared plus 3"><semantics><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> for <math alttext="x greater or equal than 0"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>≥</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>. Which of the following expressions defines the inverse function of <math alttext="f"><semantics><mi>f</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> ?

choices.label: ​<math alttext="f to the power of negative 1 end exponent open parentheses x close parentheses equals x squared over 4 minus 3"><semantics><mrow><msup><mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mn>4</mn></mfrac><mo>-</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> for <math alttext="x greater or equal than 0"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>≥</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="f to the power of negative 1 end exponent open parentheses x close parentheses equals square root of x over 4 end root minus 3"><semantics><mrow><msup><mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mfrac><mi>x</mi><mn>4</mn></mfrac></msqrt><mo>-</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> for <math alttext="x greater or equal than 0"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>≥</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="f to the power of negative 1 end exponent open parentheses x close parentheses equals square root of fraction numerator x minus 3 over denominator 4 end fraction end root"><semantics><mrow><msup><mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mfrac><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mn>4</mn></mfrac></msqrt></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> for <math alttext="x greater or equal than 3"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>≥</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="f to the power of negative 1 end exponent open parentheses x close parentheses equals fraction numerator square root of x minus 3 end root over denominator 4 end fraction"><semantics><mrow><msup><mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msqrt><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>3</mn></msqrt><mn>4</mn></mfrac></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> for <math alttext="x greater or equal than 3"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>≥</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

content.answer: ​<math alttext="f to the power of negative 1 end exponent open parentheses x close parentheses equals square root of fraction numerator x minus 3 over denominator 4 end fraction end root"><semantics><mrow><msup><mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mfrac><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mn>4</mn></mfrac></msqrt></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> for <math alttext="x greater or equal than 3"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>≥</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Solve equations and inequalities represented analytically, with and without technology.
